name: A Miner's Debts
description:
A Miner's Debts

A Miner's Debts is a 3D dungeon crawler about mining and exploration.

Arrow keys to move

Mouse to interact

Space to use your pick

Credits:

  • Design / Programming / Art - TheJaspel - Twitter - Itch
  • Music - BinaryCounter - Twitter - Itch
  • UI / Cover - Lone Rabbit - Twitter - Itch

Soundtrack: Bandcamp
